explains: n. （战争、疾病、暴力等的）爆发，突然发生

sentences.en: The area was struck by an outbreak of cholera.
His death set in motion a train of events that led to the outbreak of war.
sentences.cn: 他的死引发了一系列的事件，从而导致了战争的爆发。

sentences.en: He was interned as an enemy alien at the outbreak of the Second World War.
sentences.cn: 他在第二次世界大战爆发时被作为敌国侨民扣押了。
